channel.title: Home on Environmentalist VIP
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Environmentalist VIP

item.title: About
item.description: This blog is for you, the silent majority who have no voice. may help you if you check any of the following: You care about the environment, but you are too important to adjust your living standards or the way you go about your life. You want to project an image of a champion for the environment without putting any effort to actually save the environment. You want to be perceived by your friends as a warrior for the environment without actually doing anything.

item.title: Translation Support
item.description: You can translate Minimo in your own language! For example, if you want to translate Minimo in Spanish, you will have to add this to your site's config file: [languages.es] lang = "es" languageName = "Spanish" weight = 1 Then create a folder named /i18n/ in your site's root. And create a file /i18n/es.toml with the translated strings. For reference template you can see the en.toml file. If you want your translation file to be included in Minimo repository, feel free to create a pull request.
